fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Construct a mine during the day.
- Collapse a constructed mine during the day. May **not** be used in conjunction w/ first ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With a mine constructed, any player not roleblocked as the night began (e.g. Jailed) may choose to enter the mine during the night. This does not take up their night ability. Players who enter the mine will be given powerful defense.
- If more than a third of living players (when the mine it was constructed, rounded up, min. 2) enter a mine throughout it's lifespan, it will collapse, dealing an unstoppable attack to everyone who entered that night, and roleblocking them past immunity.
- You will be informed how many players visited the active mine throughout it's lifespan at the end of every night.
- You may only have one mine constructed at a time.
